```{r}
jsonlite::fromJSON("https://od.cdc.gov.tw/eic/Day_Confirmation_Age_County_Gender_19CoV.json") -> covid19
```

```{r}
# 不可排序類別：性別、縣市、是否境外移入
covid19$縣市 <- 
  factor(covid19$縣市)
covid19$性別 <-
  factor(covid19$性別)
covid19$是否為境外移入 <-
  factor(
    covid19$是否為境外移入
  )
```

```{r}
# 可排序類別資料：年齡層
covid19$年齡層 <-
  factor(
    covid19$年齡層,
    ordered=TRUE
  )
```

```{r}
levels(covid19$縣市)
levels(covid19$性別)
levels(covid19$是否為境外移入)
```

```{r}
covid19$年齡層
levels(covid19$年齡層)
```

```{r}
#重新設定
levels(covid19$性別)
covid19$性別 <- factor(covid19$性別,c("男","女"))
levels(covid19$性別)
```

```{r}
jsonlite::fromJSON(
  "https://www.dropbox.com/s/jckqryeh5zeat5w/regionPopulation.json?dl=1"
) -> population
unlist(population) -> population
```

```{r}
print(population)
class(population) # 判斷出是named integer vector
names(population) # 元素名稱是台灣各縣市
```

```{r}
#留下covid19裡面有的縣市
levels(covid19$縣市)->levelsInData
population[levelsInData]->population


```
```{r}
#將population由大排到小
sort(population,decreasing = T) ->population
population
```
```{r}
#存取排完後的元素名稱
newLevels<-names(population)
newLevels
```
```{r}
#重設縣市排序
covid19$縣市<-factor(
  covid19$縣市,
  levels=newLevels
)

levels(covid19$縣市)
```

```{r}
#用年齡區間起始數字排序
levels(covid19$年齡層)
```
```{r}
level_names <-levels(covid19$年齡層)
startingAges <- stringr::str_extract(
  level_names,
  "^[0-9]+"
)
startingAges
```

```{r}
#將startingAges 變成name integer factor
startingAges<-as.integer(startingAges)
names(startingAges)<-level_names
startingAges
```

```{r}
sort(startingAges) ->startingAges
```

```{r}
#重設levels排序
covid19$`年齡層`<-
  factor(
  covid19$`年齡層`,
  levels=names(startingAges)
  )
levels(covid19$年齡層)

```
